text: Hi guys, does anyone pass the Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations course? I have a few questions about project which I cant understand at the moment.
Hi Stefan, this is Brooke. I'm happy to answer questions you have about this course :)

Hi Brooke, thanks for quick feedback. I would like to praise you for mentoring, you are my favorite HS teacher. I have few question about course. Can we use "<https://api.HubSpot.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/>" api for this practicum examples? And for this "image" part, for this page we only need page title and one link for homepage?

If you don't have access to using custom objects, you can use `<https://api.HubSpot.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts>` endpoint for the practicum.

On the Update custom object form page, you need the HTML form to add new records to your CRM, along with a quick link back to the homepage. Let me know if that makes sense!
At the moment I don't have access. Did you mean something like this, but instead of adding book, we need to add new item to our contacts list? :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks again for your help!
Yes, it should be an HTML form that allows you to add a new contact to your CRM. :slightly_smiling_face:
